protocol.name: P-GSE14332-12
protocol.text: Half of the rosette leaves of six weeks old WT  plants were wounded by clamping a tweezers across the midvein. RNA was extracted from control  leaves 2 h after wounding, and was subject to affymetrix ATH1 chip.

protocol.name: P-GSE14332-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown under white light in a 10-h-light/14-h-dark cycle (short day ) at 21°C.

protocol.name: P-GSE14332-5
protocol.text: Extraction of total RNA was performed using RNeasy plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacture's protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE14332-7
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix), in the Weizmann Institute microarray unit

protocol.name: P-GSE14332-8
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 12 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45°C on GeneChip ATH1. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE14332-9
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GC3000 7G.
